description: Bank-level security for you to manage your finances with complete peace of mind. Your privacy is our priority.

layeredProtection.title: Protection at all layers
layeredProtection.description: We implement multiple layers of security to ensure your financial information is always protected. From the moment you log in to each transaction processed, everything is encrypted and monitored.

encryption.title: End-to-end encryption
encryption.description: All data is protected with AES-256 encryption, the same standard used by banks and government institutions.

control.title: You control everything
control.description: Your data is exclusively yours. You decide what to share and can delete everything at any time.

compliance.title: Full compliance
compliance.description: We strictly follow LGPD and Central Bank regulations. Constantly audited by independent third parties.

infrastructure.title: Secure infrastructure
infrastructure.description: Tier 1 cloud servers with geographic redundancy, automatic backups and 24/7 monitoring.
